trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Cursor" /> is used to maintain a specific location in a <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> when reading the queue's messages.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Cursor" /> 用于在读取队列的消息时保持 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 中的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: To get a cursor for a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>, call the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CreateCursor%2A> method for that queue.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取光标<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>，调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CreateCursor%2A>该队列的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Messaging.Cursor> is used with such methods as <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%2CSystem.Messaging.PeekAction%29> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%29> when you need to read messages that are not at the front of the queue.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Messaging.Cursor>等方法一起使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%2CSystem.Messaging.PeekAction%29>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%29>何时需要读取不位于队列开头的消息。

trans-unit.source: This includes reading messages synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 这包括同步或异步读取消息。

trans-unit.source: Cursors do not need to be used to read only the first message in a queue.
trans-unit.target: 游标不需要可用于读取队列中的，第一条消息仅。

trans-unit.source: When reading messages within a transaction, Message Queuing does not roll back cursor movement if the transaction is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 在读取事务中的消息，消息队列不会回滚光标移动如果则中止此事务。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose there is a queue with two messages, A1 and A2.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假定有具有 A1 和 A2 的两个消息的队列。

trans-unit.source: If you remove message A1 while in a transaction, Message Queuing moves the cursor to message A2.
trans-unit.target: 如果你删除消息在事务中的 A1，消息队列将光标移到消息 A2。

trans-unit.source: However, if the transaction is aborted for any reason, message A1 is inserted back into the queue but the cursor remains pointing at message A2.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果出于任何原因，则中止此事务，仍然指向消息 A2 A1 插入回队列中，但光标的消息。

trans-unit.source: Closes the cursor, allowing Message Queuing to release the associated resources.
trans-unit.target: 关闭游标，允许“消息队列”释放关联的资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Cursor" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Cursor" /> 使用的所有资源。
